# Read data

```{r data}
headings_em <- read_csv("data/raw/headings-emilian.csv")
headings_eo <- read_csv("data/raw/headings-esperanto.csv")

emilian <- read_csv("data/raw/emilian-clean.csv", skip = 1, col_names = headings_em$new)
esperanto <- read_csv("data/raw/esperanto-clean.csv", skip = 1, col_names = headings_eo$new)
```
